Text.Name: SuperPart_Tiger_1
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by tiger Yaoguai. Once achieved, they can stay calm and composed while facing battles with the heart of a king.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Unlock Battle Stance: Will of the King

Text.Name: SuperPart_Tiger_2
Text.Desc: A secret body naturally possessed by tiger Yaoguai. Once achieved, it will carry strong wind wherever it goes and increase the secret body global power.
Text.Levels.0.Title: First Layer
Text.Levels.0.Desc: Increases the physical cultivator's secret body power by 10%.
